data.name: Soccer World
data.description:
Welcome to the ultimate virtual reality gaming experience! This game is composed of four exciting mini-games that will put your skills to the test.

First up is Goal Attack. Use your precision and quick reflexes to shoot past the obstacles and rack up points.

Next, it's time to switch sides and play Goal Defense. As the goalie, you'll need to protect the net and prevent your opponent from scoring. Be ready to dive and block shots from all angles! You can choose to play handmade levels, or dive into our Infinite Mode, where you must defend against a series of increasingly more difficult shots, each one being faster and harder to predict than the last!

In the Memory mini-game, you'll need to use your brainpower to remember and match various objects. With each level, the difficulty increases, and you'll need to stay focused to get a high score.

And finally, Foosball! This classic tabletop game has been brought to life in virtual reality. Compete against the computer in a fast-paced match, where you'll need to use your hand-eye coordination and strategic thinking to score.

With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, this virtual reality game is the perfect way to test your skills and have fun. Get ready to experience the thrill of Goal Attack, the challenge of Goal Defense, the excitement of Memory, and the new release mini-game of Foosball!
